text: The men's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 2005 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Erfurt, Germany, at Steigerwaldstadion on 16 and 17 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Witold Bańka Piotr Zrada Daniel Dąbrowski Piotr Kędzia ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Andrew Steele Rhys Williams Richard Davenport Robert Tobin ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Daniël Ward Daniël de Wild Sjors Kampen Robert Lathouwers ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 17 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !!
